title: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. b. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. c. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up / down can be applied to more than one item. d. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. e. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open 'Modify Parameters' dialog.
2. Observe the marking between the button and list.
3. Observe the top button.
4. Check if the table has a label.
5. Try selecting multiple items in the table.
6. Check if the signature preview wraps its content.
7. Hover over the signature preview and observe the background color.
